name: lista-compras-microservices
description: Sistema distribuído para gerenciamento de listas de compras com microsserviços

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/user-service && npm install && cd ../item-service && npm install && cd ../list-service && npm install && cd ../../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:item" "npm run start:list" "npm run start:gateway"
